author: Kyle Davidson
description: A bittersweet cocktail that's best enjoyed as an aperitivo.
name: Art of Choke
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of mixing glass
Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
